Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Requires certain health care providers to disclose certain facts in regards to probation to current and new patients
Summary: Requires certain health care providers to disclose certain facts in regards to probation to current and new patients.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring certain health care providers to disclose certain facts in regards to probation to current and new patients
